content: That's great! I'd love to explore more about the connection between Impressionism and modern art movements. I've been fascinated by the way Impressionist artists like Monet and Renoir paved the way for later movements. Speaking of which, I recently visited the Natural History Museum's "Dinosaurs of the Ancient World" exhibit, and I was struck by the similarities between the artistic renderings of dinosaurs and the expressive brushstrokes of Impressionist paintings.
